subject:
TopCoder(R) Single Round Match sponsored by DRW - $5,000 prize
 purse!!
body:
Hello sm1lies,

TopCoder(R) Single Round Match 350 is scheduled for Wednesday, May 23 at 9:00 PM Eastern Daylight Time (UTC/GMT -4 hours).

Please be sure to check here for the start time in your time zone:
http://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?day=23&month=5&year=2007&hour=21&min=00&sec=0&p1=179

* $5,000 in SRM prizes, provided by DRW, will be given away during this match
* Registration will begin at 6:00 PM and will end at 8:55 PM Eastern Daylight Time
* Allowable programming languages are Java, C++, Microsoft(R) Visual
C#(R) .NET, and Microsoft Visual Basic(R) .NET
* TopCoder Administrators will be available in the Admin Lobby Room to answer questions
* For more details click here: 
http://www.topcoder.com/tc?module=MatchDetails&rd=10674

**********************************************************************
SRM 350 is sponsored by DRW Trading.  DRW representatives will be in the chat room at 8:00 PM EDT (GMT/UTC -4).  Don't miss your chance to learn more about DRW and their career opportunities.

Think you're the best?

Prove your coding skills in the world's biggest, most lucrative competition: the global financial markets.  

DRW is seeking TopCoder's best to engineer algorithmic trading systems.  We'll give you state-of-the-art technology and funding.  You'll give us innovative, high-performance code to beat Wall Street in the world's highest stakes game. 

Show us you have what it takes.
http://www.topcoder.com/tc?module=Static&d1=tournaments&d2=tco07&d3=sponsorspatrons&d4=drw
**********************************************************************

Best of luck to you in the Arena!

- The TopCoder Competitions Team

===================================================================
You have received this email because you indicated in your TopCoder profile that you want to be notified of TopCoder competitions.  If you no longer wish to receive these emails, login to www.topcoder.com/tc and click on 'Update My Profile'.  In the 'Email Notification' section of your TopCoder profile, you have the option to enable or disable receipt of various types of TopCoder emails.  Be sure to save any changes to your member profile.

www.topcoder.com

Glastonbury, CT 06033
